title: Right -Click takes 2 tries to work
body:
Hello

I thought it was my mouse so i bought a new one, but it wasn't. I've searched online for a solution but haven't found one

replies.body: As *Modi* mentioned, we'll need a bit more details around where you're experiencing this issue. Does this only happen in-game or is it happening out of game as well? Also, have you ever made any custom modifications to your mouse settings in your game files before?
Do you mind elaborating on what the problem is? What are you right-clicking? What is happening? What is supposed to happen?
